divs: Sighting DetailsMy friend looked up at the sky this morning and noticed the sun. had a perfectly circular rainbow around it. he captured it on a digital camera and noticed in the picture the presence of a small white orb just to the right of the sun. it is a clear photo that should be examined further. Thank you.
Summary: this morning over Miami, Florida a rainbow ring appears around the sun. photo reveals a small light orb to the right of the sun.
